"use client" import { useState, useContext } from "react" import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import { AuthContext } from "../context/AuthContext" import styles from "./Login.module.css" const Login = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ email: "", password: "", }) const [rememberMe, setRememberMe] = useState(false) const [error, setError] = useState("") const { login } = useContext(AuthContext) const navigate = useNavigate() const { email, password } = formData const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() setError("") if (!email || !password) { setError("Por favor complete todos los campos") return } const success = await login(email, password) if (success) { navigate("/") } else { setError("Credenciales inválidas") } } return (

) } export default Login
